source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic, wide-angle shot from the bow of a large container ship. The view looks out over stacks of red and blue shipping containers towards the open water and a distant, hazy coastline. A city and a large bridge can be seen in the background under a bright sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: There are also some other small boats sailing on the sea.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: In addition to the main view, there are several smaller boats visible sailing on the sea, adding to the dynamic scene.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: In addition to the main view, there are several smaller boats visible sailing on the sea, adding to the dynamic scene.
